description:
Sophocles`s Togedemaru is Sophocles` main Pok√©mon. Its Ability is Lightning Rod which makes it able to absorb electricity with its spikes and then release that electricity in the form of a move.
It participated in the second Alola! Surprise! verses Pikachu which was a balloon popping challenge. Its spikes on the back in combination with its Zing Zap move, allowed it to quickly pop all the balloons before Ash and Pikachu could to win the challenge.
name: Togedemaru (Maamane)
